Description:
Detects a DNS query by a non browser process on the system to "azurewebsites.net". The latter was often used by threat actors as a malware hosting and exfiltration site.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query To AzureWebsites.NET By Non-Browser Process
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (query_name like '%azurewebsites.net' and  not ((process_path like '%\msmpeng.exe' or process_path like '%\mssense.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\vivaldi\%' and process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\waterfox\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\waterfox\%') and process_path like '%\waterfox.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\seamonkey\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\seamonkey\%') and process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files
aver
aver whale\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)
aver
aver whale\%') and process_path like '%\whale.exe') or process_path like '%	or browser\%' or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\programs\midori-ng\%' and process_path like '%\midori next generation.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local lock\%' and process_path like '% lock.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\phoebe\%' and process_path like '%\phoebe.exe') or (process_path = 'c:\program files\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe') or (process_path = 'c:\program files\mozilla firefox irefox.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\mozilla firefox irefox.exe') or (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\internet explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\internet explorer\iexplore.exe') or (process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgewebview\application\%' and process_path like '%\windowsapps\microsoftedge.exe' and (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe')) or ((process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgecore\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files\microsoft\edgecore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or (process_path like '% rave.exe' and process_path like 'c:\program files ravesoftware\%') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\maxthon\%' and process_path like '%\maxthon.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files alkon\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86) alkon\%') and process_path like '% alkon.exe') or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\programs\opera\%' and process_path like '%\opera.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\slimbrowser\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\slimbrowser\%') and process_path like '%\slimbrowser.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\avant browser\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files\avant browser\%') and process_path like '%\avant.exe')))
